reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love Ram and Eisley
reviews.reviewText: This is the third book in this series. Ram and Eisley have history from when they were children. Too bad there was more going on the Ram knew at the time. He thought he was helping and instead caused trouble for Eisley. Now their paths have crossed again. He won’t mess up a second time. He is going to protect Eisley with everything he has. He doesn’t care that she is a US marshal. The club will understand. Eisley’s life is about to be turned upside down. Her current case seems to be connected to her past and she didn’t even realize it at the time. When other members of her team are killed and she wounded she goes to Ram for help. Maybe there is more out there for her than just her job. She is learning that not everything is as it seems. This book was a great read. I love this MC so much. It was great to get to read about them again. Addy is a fantastic author. I hope to get to read more books about these characters in the future. Great job Addy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pull the Trigger! Get this Series!
reviews.reviewText: The suspense built for each couple despite each book being able to be read as stand alone. This one really came out of left field with the plot. Yes, it's biker meets hot chick, biker wants to own hot chick, but OMG, the background and history of the two main characters builds.I hope there are other books following that perhaps cover some of the MC members lost or new ones found for this or Rebel Rage. Both series were great.The action and suspense in them was good, the build-up didn't give away everything so a few things surprised me when they happened.The level of devotion and caveman caring by the bikers over their old ladies is what makes these stories. This final one with Ram and Ellie was the crescendo you expected and makes your toes curl and your heart swell. It'll also have you snuggle up to your significant other if he's as devoted as Ram.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Elly and Ram..what a couple. Elly is a US Marshall..which is a definite no, no for the club, but Ram will not be deterred. He and Elly have history and being with her is his top priority. If only he can keep her safe so he can claim her for forever.I enjoyed this story and while reading the previous installments isn’t necessary, it will give you some back story or the characters and some previous issues that are related.Great story..and I loved Ram and Elly, her sassiness was refreshing and watching her give in to Ram was sexy as hell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you on your toes page 1 till the end!!!
reviews.reviewText: Get ready for an action packed booked! Ram and Eisley’s story is full of plot twist and turns and a romance that was meant to be that you will not want to put this book down. Ram and Eisley loved each other since they were kids but due to miscommunication they went their separate ways not knowing how the other really felt about each other. When they meet again the sparks fly right off the pages. Ram was not passing up a second chance of love with Eisley. Eisley is a strong take no crap from anyone and I loved how Ram had her back and same with her. The relationship between the old ladies in the MC is great, they all have each other’s back. I was kept of my toes throughout the whole book and loved every second of it. Trigger Pull MC is a must read series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Elly is in trouble her entire US Marshall taskforce is dead by the hands of another agent, her only chance is with the man who broke her heart as a teenager, biker Ram. Preston aka Ram has been waiting for his second chance with Elly and will take it any way he can in this action packed read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ❤ Rage & Eisley's story
reviews.reviewText: Oh I do love this MC! Rage and Eisley's story did it for me. Suspence and plot twists literally had me on the edge of my seat. I love the bikers but it's the woman with a sass and brass who wins my heart! Be prepared for all the feels! Together they can get through anything and believe me they go through a lot! The icing on the cake, the HEA! Left me wanting more!I recommend reading series in order. )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting and entertaining series! Recommend!!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very interesting and entertaining series! Please keep them coming! I really do like Bruno, he’s a big help even if he’s supposed to be bad. Ram and Elly were good together, even though they had a past. Loved the story and the characters are unforgettable! Thank you for the entertaining getaway! Recommend highly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ram And Elly
reviews.reviewText: Another awesome book by author Addy Archer! Love the Trigger Pull MC, those bikers are the no nonsense type, they kick butts and take names after. They're bad boys but they're also teddy bears when it comes to their old ladies, nicely done..

A second chance book I can thoroughly enjoy. I love their back story, and I adore the Ram and Elly, they are perfect together, lots of intrigue , suspense and excitement along the way and a few very sweet epilogues.

Like all the other Trigger PullMC books I read (only because I paid for them😒), this one was way too soppy & I kept skipping over those bits. Can’t say I’m a fan of this writer’s style. I’ve read a lot better with just as much action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a great ending to a really good series. Ram meets a face from the past who is he lost love of his life. Things don't go smoothly as she is a US Marshal.
